H0.text: Smelting ore is the major cause of acid rain.

H1.text: Evaporation of polluted water is the major cause of acid rain.

H2.text: Jet airplane exhaust high in the sky is the major cause of acid rain.

H3.text: Sulfur combining with water vapor in the atmosphere is the major cause of acid rain.

A4.text: Sulfur dioxide and nitrogen oxides can cause acid rain which lowers the pH value of soil.
